suite.name: Produtos Tests

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=serverest, url=http://localhost:3000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Criar Dados para Produto Dinamico Válido
Word
kw.doc: Generate a word.

kw.name: Random Int
kw.doc: Generate a random integer between two integers ``min`` and ``max`` inclusive while observing the provided ``step`` value.

kw.name: Text
kw.doc: Generate a text string.
kw.msg: ${descricao} = Go sing commercial how act. Whose figure then.

kw.name: Random Int
kw.doc: Generate a random integer between two integers ``min`` and ``max`` inclusive while observing the provided ``step`` value.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: ${payload} = {'nome': 'reduce', 'preco': 1193, 'descricao': 'Go sing commercial how act. Whose figure then.', 'quantidade': 31}

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.
kw.msg: ${payload} = {'nome': 'reduce', 'preco': 1193, 'descricao': 'Go sing commercial how act. Whose figure then.', 'quantidade': 31}

kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:3000/login path_url=/login headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '36', 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'} body=email=fulano%40qa.com&password=teste

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Create Dictionary

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:3000/produtos path_url=/produtos headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Authorization': 'Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJlbWFpbCI6ImZ1bGFub0BxYS5jb20iLCJwYXNzd29yZCI6InRlc3RlIiwiaWF0IjoxNjU3MDI5NjQwLCJleHAiOjE2NTcwMzAyNDB9.QU0IdQXvPhIbXhJIFrH5BVtLvcK8o2Q5PjWOcyjUYXk', 'Content-Length': '93', 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'} body=nome=reduce&preco=1193&descricao=Go+sing+commercial+how+act.+Whose+figure+then.&quantidade=31

kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Validar Se "message" Contem "Cadastro realizado com sucesso"
Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
